webDev.title: WEB DEVELOPMENT
webDev.description: We design and build bespoke websites that turn visitors into customers. Every project starts with a deep-dive into your brand, audience and business goals so the final product reflects who you are â€” not a generic template. Our development stack centres on React, Next.js and Vite, giving you server-side rendering for SEO, instant page transitions and code-splitting that keeps initial load times under 1.5 seconds. Each site is fully responsive from mobile to ultra-wide, scores 95+ on Google Lighthouse across Performance, Accessibility, Best Practices and SEO, and ships with structured data markup so search engines understand your content from day one. We wire up contact forms, analytics dashboards and CRM integrations, then hand you a live staging link for weekly review. After launch you receive 30 days of priority support, full source-code ownership and documentation so your team â€” or any developer â€” can maintain the site independently. Whether you need a single landing page or a multi-language corporate presence across France, Belgium, the Netherlands and Germany, we deliver on time and on budget.

ecommerce.title: E-COMMERCE
ecommerce.description: We build online stores engineered to sell across European markets. From product catalogue to checkout confirmation, every step is optimised for conversion: fast-loading product pages, intuitive filtering, one-click add-to-cart and a streamlined checkout flow that supports credit cards, iDEAL, Bancontact, SEPA and more via Stripe. Inventory syncs in real time, multi-currency pricing adjusts automatically and tax rules comply with EU VAT regulations out of the box. The admin panel lets you manage products, track orders, apply discount codes and generate sales reports without touching code. We integrate shipping calculators, abandoned-cart recovery emails and review systems that build social proof. On the technical side, product pages are pre-rendered for instant Google indexing, structured data powers rich search results and image optimisation keeps page weight low. Every store is fully responsive, supports four languages by default and includes 30 days of post-launch support plus staff training on the admin dashboard. The result: a store that loads fast, ranks well, and converts browsers into buyers.

seo.title: SEO & ANALYTICS
seo.description: We help European businesses get found on Google â€” and stay there. Our process begins with a comprehensive technical audit: crawlability, indexation, Core Web Vitals, mobile usability, structured data and internal link architecture. We fix every issue that blocks search engines from understanding your site, then move into keyword research tailored to your market â€” whether that is Paris, London, Brussels or Amsterdam. On-page optimisation covers meta titles, descriptions, heading hierarchy, image alt text and schema markup for rich results. We set up Google Search Console and Analytics 4 so you can track impressions, clicks, rankings and conversions in real time. For ongoing clients we deliver monthly performance reports with clear action items: new content recommendations, backlink opportunities and competitor gap analysis. Our approach is data-driven and transparent â€” no black-hat tricks, no vanity metrics, just measurable organic growth. Clients typically see a 40-120 % increase in organic traffic within the first six months. Whether you need a one-time audit or continuous optimisation, we tailor the scope to your budget and goals.

pricing.carePlanDescription: Your website is a living asset â€” it needs regular care to stay fast, secure and visible. Our Care Plan covers everything after launch so you can focus on running your business. We handle managed hosting with SSL, CDN and 99.9 % uptime, apply CMS and dependency updates before vulnerabilities become exploits, and run automated security scans that flag issues in real time. Every month you receive a clear performance report covering uptime, page speed, traffic trends and SEO rankings alongside actionable recommendations. Need a text change, a new banner or a seasonal promotion? Content updates are included â€” just email us the details. Priority support means your requests jump the queue: critical fixes within 4 hours, standard requests within 24. We also monitor Core Web Vitals and proactively optimise images, caching and code bundles so your Lighthouse scores stay above 95. For Pro and Enterprise tiers we add weekly check-ins, A/B testing, quarterly strategy calls and dedicated account management. Whether you have one site or ten, the Care Plan gives you peace of mind and keeps your online presence performing at its peak.
pricing.faq1Q: What is the difference between templates and custom development?
pricing.faq1A: Templates are pre-built designs customized with your brand (logo, colors, text) and delivered in 24h-5 days. Custom development is a 100% unique website built from scratch by our professional team, tailored to your exact needs.
pricing.faq2Q: What is included in the price?
pricing.faq2A: Design, development, testing, deployment, and free support (30-90 days depending on plan). Domain and hosting are separate, or included with a Care Plan.
pricing.faq3A: Yes. 50% upfront, 50% on delivery. For Scale and Commerce tiers, we offer 3-part payment.
pricing.faq4Q: Can I upgrade from a template to custom later?
pricing.faq4A: Absolutely! Start with a template and upgrade to a custom build anytime. We will credit your template purchase toward the custom project.
pricing.faq5Q: What if I am not satisfied with the result?
pricing.faq5A: Every package includes revision rounds. We work until you are 100% happy. Our satisfaction guarantee means you only pay for work you approve.
pricing.faq6Q: How do the care plans work?
pricing.faq6A: Care plans provide ongoing hosting, updates, security, and support. Choose Basic for essentials, Pro for priority service, or Enterprise for full management.
pricing.faq7Q: Do you work with businesses outside Europe?
pricing.faq7A: We primarily serve European businesses (France, UK, Belgium, Netherlands, Germany), but we welcome projects from anywhere. Contact us to discuss.
pricing.faq8A: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion. We build fast, modern, and maintainable sites with 98+ Lighthouse scores.

about.headline: WE ARE DMC KREATIF
about.description: A UK-registered web development agency with a 28-strong core team and 150+ specialist network serving European businesses across 12+ countries. We combine cutting-edge React and Next.js technology with premium design to deliver websites that convert.
about.founderBio: Musa Kerem Demirci is the founder of DMC Kreatif, a UK-registered web development agency with a 28-strong core team and a network of 150+ vetted specialists across Europe. With deep expertise in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and modern web architecture, he leads strategy and technical architecture across all projects â€” ensuring 95+ Google Lighthouse scores, sub-2-second load times, and multilingual SEO implementation. The agency operates fully distributed: one registered office in London, co-working access in Paris, Brussels, Amsterdam, Berlin, Zurich, Barcelona, and Copenhagen. Clients span 12+ European countries across construction, energy, finance, and e-commerce sectors, with a 5.0/5 client satisfaction score. Musa holds a Computer Engineering degree and speaks English, French, and Turkish. His philosophy: every pixel matters, every millisecond counts, and every European business deserves a website that truly converts.
about.missionText: To deliver premium web solutions that help European businesses grow. Every pixel matters. Every millisecond counts.
about.value1Description: We don't cut corners. Every project gets the same attention to detail, whether it's a landing page or a full e-commerce store.
about.value2Description: 98+ Lighthouse scores, sub-2-second load times, and SEO-optimized from day one. We build fast websites.
about.value3Description: We understand the European market. Multilingual, GDPR-compliant, and culturally aware design.
about.techList: Next.js // React // TypeScript // Tailwind CSS // Framer Motion // Vite // Supabase // Vercel
about.value4Description: Your success is our success. We communicate openly, deliver on time, and go the extra mile for every project.
about.milestone1Desc: Launched as a solo premium web agency targeting European businesses. Built the full-stack development and SEO workflow from the ground up.
about.milestone2Desc: Delivered first major projects for Cakir Facades, Altinbas Moustiquaire, and Consulting Energy in France. Established a trusted track record in the French market.
about.milestone3Desc: Registered the company in the United Kingdom. Opened London headquarters and expanded to serve UK clients including Adamsons Accountants.
about.milestone4Desc: Successfully delivered projects across France, Belgium, and the United Kingdom. Built a solid reputation for premium design and performance-first development.
about.milestone5Desc: Extended services to Netherlands and Germany. Launched multilingual platform with 4 languages (EN/FR/NL/DE) for full European market coverage.
about.milestone6Desc: Launched ready-made website templates for quick delivery. Established specialist partner network for scalable project delivery across Europe.

contact.introHeading: Start a Conversation About Your Project
contact.introText: Whether you need a new website, want to redesign an existing one, or are exploring e-commerce options, we are here to help. Fill out the form below and we will respond within 24 hours with a tailored proposal. We work with businesses across France, Belgium, the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, and Germany â€” in English, French, Dutch, or German. No commitment required. Just tell us about your business and what you are looking to achieve online.

blog.introText: Practical articles on web development, SEO strategy, e-commerce, and digital marketing â€” written for business owners across France, Belgium, the UK, the Netherlands, and Germany. We share lessons from real client projects, explain modern technologies like React and Next.js in plain language, and break down what actually moves the needle for small and medium businesses online. Whether you are planning your first website or scaling an existing one, these posts will help you make better decisions.

privacy.seoDescription: Learn how DMC Kreatif collects, uses, and protects your personal data. GDPR compliant privacy policy.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Last updated: February 2026
privacy.intro: DMC Kreatif ("we", "us", "our") is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website (dmckreatif.com) or use our services.

dataCollection.title: 1. Data We Collect
dataCollection.content:
We collect the following types of personal data:

- Contact information (name, email address, phone number, company name) provided through our contact forms
- Account information when you register for our client portal
- Usage data collected through cookies and analytics tools
- Project-related information you share during our collaboration
- Payment information processed securely through our payment providers (LemonSqueezy, Wise)

dataUsage.title: 2. How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content:
We use your personal data to:

- Respond to inquiries and provide customer support
- Deliver web development services as agreed
- Send project updates and invoices
- Improve our website and services
- Send marketing communications (only with your explicit consent)
- Comply with legal obligations

cookies.title: 3. Cookies & Tracking
cookies.content:
Our website uses cookies for:

- Essential cookies: Required for website functionality (session, language preference)
- Analytics cookies: Google Analytics 4 to understand how visitors use our site (only with consent)
- Marketing cookies: To measure advertising effectiveness (only with consent)

You can manage your cookie preferences at any time using our cookie settings.

thirdParty.title: 4. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content:
We share data with the following service providers:

- Supabase (database hosting, EU region)
- Google Analytics 4 (website analytics)
- LemonSqueezy (payment processing)
- Wise Business (invoicing and payments)
- Hostinger (web hosting)

All providers are GDPR-compliant and process data according to their own privacy policies.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.content:
Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to:

- Access your personal data
- Rectify inaccurate data
- Request deletion of your data
- Restrict processing of your data
- Data portability
- Object to processing
- Withdraw consent at any time

To exercise any of these rights, contact us at hello@dmckreatif.com.

retention.title: 6. Data Retention
retention.content:
We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, typically:

- Contact form data: 2 years
- Client account data: Duration of business relationship + 5 years
- Invoicing data: 7 years (legal requirement)
- Analytics data: 14 months

security.title: 7. Data Security
security.content:
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including:

- Encrypted connections (HTTPS/TLS)
- Secure database storage with row-level security
- Regular security audits
- Access controls and authentication
- Data backup and recovery procedures

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content:
If you have questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, contact us:

DMC Kreatif
Email: hello@dmckreatif.com
Website: https://dmckreatif.com

terms.seoTitle: Terms of Service â€” DMC Kreatif
terms.seoDescription: Read the terms and conditions for using DMC Kreatif web development services.
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Last updated: February 2026
terms.intro: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of DMC Kreatif's website and web development services. By engaging our services, you agree to these terms.

services.title: 1. Services
services.content:
DMC Kreatif provides web development, e-commerce, SEO, and digital marketing services to businesses in Europe and the United Kingdom. Our service packages include:

- Launch (â‚¬497): Custom landing page with responsive design
- Growth (â‚¬997): Multi-page website with blog and advanced SEO
- Scale (â‚¬1,997): Full website with multilingual support
- Commerce (â‚¬2,997): E-commerce platform with payment integration
- Care Plans (from â‚¬97/month): Ongoing maintenance and support

We also offer ready-made website templates from â‚¬39. Detailed specifications for each package are available on our pricing page.

payment.title: 2. Payment Terms
payment.content:
- A 50% deposit is required before work begins
- The remaining 50% is due upon project completion, before final delivery
- Payments can be made via bank transfer (Wise) or online payment (LemonSqueezy)
- All prices are in Euros (EUR) and exclude VAT where applicable
- Late payments may incur a 2% monthly fee
- Template purchases are non-refundable once customization work has begun

delivery.title: 3. Project Delivery
delivery.content:
- Estimated delivery timelines are provided at project start
- Timelines may be affected by client response times and feedback delays
- Up to 2 rounds of revisions are included in each package
- Additional revisions may be charged at our standard hourly rate
- Final files are delivered upon receipt of full payment

ip.title: 4. Intellectual Property
ip.content:
- Upon full payment, the client receives ownership of the custom website design and content created specifically for their project
- DMC Kreatif retains the right to showcase the project in our portfolio
- Third-party assets (fonts, stock images, plugins) remain subject to their original licenses
- DMC Kreatif retains ownership of proprietary tools, templates, and frameworks used in development

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.content:
- DMC Kreatif's total liability is limited to the amount paid for the specific service
- We are not liable for indirect, consequential, or incidental damages
- We are not responsible for third-party service disruptions (hosting, payment processors, etc.)
- Clients are responsible for maintaining backups of their website content

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.content:
- Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice
- If the client terminates, payment is due for all work completed up to the termination date
- If DMC Kreatif terminates, all completed work will be delivered to the client
- Care Plan subscriptions can be cancelled with 30 days notice

governing.title: 7. Governing Law
governing.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the European Union. Any disputes shall be resolved through mediation before pursuing legal action. The courts of Belgium shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to update these terms. Existing clients will be notified of material changes at least 30 days in advance. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content:
For questions about these terms, contact us:

DMC Kreatif
Email: hello@dmckreatif.com
Website: https://dmckreatif.com

cookies.mobileShort: We use cookies to improve your experience.
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your experience. Necessary cookies are required for the site to function. Analytics and marketing cookies help us understand traffic and improve our services.
cookies.necessaryDesc: Required for the website to function. Cannot be disabled.
cookies.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website (Google Analytics).
cookies.marketingDesc: Used for targeted advertising and measuring ad campaign performance (Google Ads).

process.title: From Idea to Launch in 4 Steps
process.step1Desc: Free 30-minute consultation. We discuss your goals, target audience, competitors, and technical requirements.
process.step2Desc: We deliver a tailored proposal with wireframes, design mockups, and a clear timeline. You approve before we start.
process.step3Desc: We build your site with modern tech (React, Vite, Tailwind). You get weekly updates and a staging preview.
process.step4Desc: After your approval, we deploy the site live. Ongoing support available through our Care Plan (â‚¬97/mo).
process.ctaText: Ready to start your project? Let's talk.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does it take to build a website?
faq.a1: Our Starter package (single page) takes 5-7 business days. Growth package (5-7 pages) takes 10-14 days. Scale and Commerce packages take 14-30 days depending on complexity. We always deliver on time or your money back.
faq.a2: We use modern, fast technologies: React 18, Next.js 14, Vite, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. For e-commerce, we integrate Stripe, LemonSqueezy, or Shopify. Every site scores 95+ on Google Lighthouse performance tests.
faq.a3: Yes! We build multilingual websites as standard. We support English, French, Dutch, German, and any other European language. Each language gets proper SEO with hreflang tags, localized URLs, and native-quality translations.
faq.q4: What is included in the Care Plan?
faq.a4: The Care Plan (â‚¬97/month) includes: premium hosting, SSL certificate, monthly security updates, performance monitoring, 2 hours of content changes, monthly analytics report, priority email support, and 99.9% uptime guarantee.
faq.a5: We serve businesses across Europe: France, Belgium, United Kingdom, Netherlands, Germany, Switzerland, and Scandinavian countries. We communicate in English, French, Dutch, and German.
faq.a6: Every website we build includes SEO basics: proper meta tags, structured data (Schema.org), fast loading times, mobile optimization, and XML sitemap. For advanced SEO, we offer monthly SEO management starting at â‚¬247/month.
faq.q7: What happens after the website is delivered?
faq.a7: After delivery, you own the website 100%. You can manage it yourself or subscribe to our Care Plan for ongoing maintenance, hosting, and support. We also offer training sessions to help you update content independently.
faq.q8: Can I see examples of your work?
faq.a8: Absolutely! Visit our Portfolio page to see live projects across France, Belgium, and the UK. We've built websites for construction companies, energy consultants, accountants, and e-commerce stores.
